answers.answer: Dear geewilicurs,Well Ankylosing Spondylitis is an autoimmune disease and is chronic inflamatory condition.Most common association is seen with the presence of HLA-B27 genotype.SO anti-Inflamatories are must, for this condition.It mainly affects the spine-due to which neck movements,bending activities are affected and the Rib cage-due to which respiratory movements becomes affected.CAUSE-Being auto-immune in nature, we can't comment on the exact cause of it, but there are plenty of theories related to it.The presence of other conditions like DM (Diabetes Mellitus), Coronary Artery Disease is not helping you at all.Please be regular touch with your general practitioner or Rheumatologist, who can surely help you out of it by controlling this disease.Take care and precaution,Regards.
